cause.description:
If someone does a crime at 12 they know what they are doingand should pay the price.weither it is mine or yours u pay.3 years for murder is a joke.U kill mine i want more than that.this is why are crime rate is so high because they know they can get away with it.Lets get rid of it and stop the drive bys and killings in our city Im from toronto and i would never move back there because of the crime rate LETS TRY TO STOP IT AND MAKE IT SAFE FOR FUTURE GENERATIONS
1. YOUNG OFFENDERS
cause.name: STOP CRIME IN OUR CITY
